FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Secure and reliable international money transfer services, connecting you with loved ones worldwide.

HOME.TITLE: Seamless International Money Transfer
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Transfer funds from the UK, US, and Canada to destinations across Africa, and Latin America with competitive exchange rates. Enjoy speedy transfers directly to mobile wallets on major networks, allowing you to send money effortlessly from your smartphone, anytime, anywhere.

STEPS.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Our app makes it easy to send money to your loved ones across borders. Enjoy fast, secure transactions with just a few taps.

STEP_1.TITLE: 1. Create an Account
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Sign up in minutes with just a few details to get started.

STEP_2.TITLE: 2. Choose Your Recipient
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Select who you want to send money to from your contacts.

STEP_3.TITLE: 3. Enter Amount
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Specify the amount you wish to send, and see the conversion rate.

STEP_4.TITLE: 4. Confirm and Send
STEP_4.DESCRIPTION: Review the details and send the money instantly.

COUNTRIES_SECTION.TITLE: Where can you send money with ZendP?

WAYS_TO_SEND.TITLE: Ways to send money internationally
WAYS_TO_SEND.DESCRIPTION: The cost and speed of a money transfer depend on the receiving country, the receive method, and the payment method. Here are four ways to send money with ZendP.

FAST_TRANSFERS.TITLE: Fast Transfers
FAST_TRANSFERS.DESCRIPTION: Send money instantly with real-time processing, ensuring your loved ones get funds quickly.

SECURE_PAYMENTS.TITLE: Secure Payments
SECURE_PAYMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Our secure platform keeps your transactions protected with state-of-the-art encryption.

LOW_FEES.TITLE: Low Fees
LOW_FEES.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy competitive rates and low transaction fees, making international transfers affordable.

AIRTIME_TOP_UP.TITLE: Airtime top up
AIRTIME_TOP_UP.DESCRIPTION: Top up credit for a pre-paid mobile phone number with no extra fees.

BANK_TRANSFER.TITLE: Bank transfer
BANK_TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: Send money directly to a bank account. All you need are your receiver's details.

CASH_PICKUP.TITLE: Cash pickup
CASH_PICKUP.DESCRIPTION: Send money to be collected in cash at any of our pickup locations.

MOBILE_MONEY.TITLE: Mobile money
MOBILE_MONEY.DESCRIPTION: Instant transfer to your receiver's registered mobile money account number.

FAQ_SECTION.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Check out some of the most commonly asked questions by our users.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How long does a transfer take?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Typically, transfers take between 1-2 business days, but some methods are instant depending on the receiving bank and country.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: What are the fees for sending money?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Our fees vary depending on the transfer amount, destination, and payment method. We offer competitive rates to ensure you get the most value.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Is it safe to send money with ZendP?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Yes, we use advanced encryption and security protocols to keep your transactions and personal information safe and secure.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Can I track my transfer?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Yes, you can track your transfer in real-time through our app or website by entering your transaction ID.

REVIEWS_SECTION.TITLE: See what our users are saying

TESTIMONIALS.REVIEW: My experience with ZendP has been excellent! The app is user-friendly and cost-effective. I can send money to my family easily.
TESTIMONIALS.NAME: Aye Joie, USA

TESTIMONIALS.REVIEW: ZendP is amazing! The fast exchange rate and secure transactions have made it my favorite. Plus, I even got a bonus on my first transaction!
TESTIMONIALS.NAME: Trang, Toronto

TESTIMONIALS.REVIEW: Sending money has never been this easy! ZendP has great rates, and my family receives funds instantly. It feels like home!

ON_APP.TITLE: ZendP is only available on mobile
ON_APP.DESCRIPTION: Download the ZendP app from your app store and start sending money on the go.
ON_APP.QR_CODE_NOTE: Scan the QR code to download the app
